channel.title: Bots on A guy with 'Ego' in his name
channel.description: Recent content in Bots on A guy with 'Ego' in his name

item.title: My favourite GitHub bots
item.description: Year 2018 was an eye-opening year for me as an OSS project maintainer. The reason is due to the emerge of GitHub bots. Maintaining a project on GitHub could be a challenging task, expecially when the project becomes popular. Issue management, releases, follow-ups, dependency management, oh my! But, as most of the developers, we’re lazy enough and spend time automating things. Dependabot https://github.com/apps/dependabot There are many nice bots, but Dependabot is a real “Good Boy Bot”!
